text:
......Mamimi
These costumes, each have their own designs, right?

The shapes are different, the fabric is different, but still
they each have their own appeals.
I personally like each of the designs.

... but still, in my opinion, just wearing matching costumes
won't make you into a unit.

Before wearing costumes, sharing advice with eachother and
working hard together to try to reach the same objective...

Sharing something together like that, won't the feeling
of a unit, spread like through you all?

......
...What happened to the conversation about the design...

Hmm well...
I guess I got the gist of it... somehow.
